original_text: Then the person who sat on the cloud moved his sharp knife over the earth. He cut down the earth's plants and he brought in the harvest.
korean_text: 구름 위에 앉으신 이가 낫을 땅에 휘두르매 땅의 곡식이 거두어지니라

sentences.original_text: Then the person who sat on the cloud
moved his sharp knife over the earth
He cut down the earth's plants
and he brought in the harvest
